sentences.en: ...the length of the fish.
sentences.cn: …鱼的长度。

sentences.en: a length of rope/pipe/wire etc
sentences.cn: 一段绳子/管子/电线等

sentences.en: Add a length of ribbon tied in a bow.
sentences.cn: 再用一段丝带，系个蝴蝶结。

sentences.en: Allow for some shrinkage in both length and width.
sentences.cn: 长、宽上都预留出一定的缩水量。

sentences.en: At length we arrived at our destination.
sentences.cn: 我们终于到达了目的地

sentences.en: He struck a match, and held it at arm's length.
sentences.cn: 他划亮一根火柴，伸长胳膊举着。

sentences.en: He was white, with brown shoulder-length hair and a moustache.
sentences.cn: 他是个白人，留着棕色的齐肩发并蓄着小胡子。

sentences.en: It is about a metre in length.
sentences.cn: 它大约有一米长。

sentences.en: One of them unwound a length of rope from around his waist.
sentences.cn: 其中一人把绑在腰间的一条绳子解下来。

sentences.en: She had always kept his family at arm's length.
sentences.cn: 她一直与他的家人保持一定距离。

sentences.en: She has travelled the length and breadth of Britain.
sentences.cn: 她游历了英国各地。

sentences.en: spoke at length about the court ruling.
sentences.cn: 就法庭裁决做了长时间的发言

sentences.en: The Egyptians probably measured their day in twenty-four hours of unequal length.
sentences.cn: 埃及人很有可能用不同长度的24小时来度量日子。

sentences.en: The films are a mix of anima-tion and full-length features.
sentences.cn: 这些电影将动画制作和长篇故事片融为一体。

sentences.en: The guy just loves to yap, and will do so at length.
sentences.cn: 那家伙就爱胡扯，而且一说起来就没完没了。

sentences.en: The inspiration stemming from his travels lasted the length of his career.
sentences.cn: 由旅行得来的灵感伴随了他的整个职业生涯。

sentences.en: The length of a paragraph depends on the information it conveys.
sentences.cn: 段落的长度取决于它所传达的信息。

sentences.en: The length of the war is one of the biggest unknowns.
sentences.cn: 战争要持续多久是最大的未知数之一。

sentences.en: The young women are splendidly dressed, some in floor-length ball gowns.
sentences.cn: 年轻女子们都穿得非常漂亮，有些还穿着拖地的舞裙。

sentences.en: They trekked from shop to shop in search of white knee-length socks.
sentences.cn: 他们拖着步子从一家商店走到另一家，寻找齐膝的白袜子。

sentences.en: We measured the length and width of the living room.
sentences.cn: 我们量了客厅的长和宽。

sentences.en: women from the length and breadth of Russia.
sentences.cn: 来自全俄罗斯的妇女。

sentences.en: You’ll need several pieces of string of different lengths.
sentences.cn: 你需要几根长度不等的绳子。

phrases.tran_cn: 疏远；在手臂伸得到的地方
详尽地：相当长的一段时间；彻底地
裂纹长度；裂缝长度；裂隙长度

trans.tran_cn: 长度，篇幅，时间的长短，有…长度的，一节，池长，艇位，马位
trans.tran_en: the measurement of how long something is from one end to the other
